message.name: ERR_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_FV_CRITERION_LONG
message.locale: Criterion must be less than or equal to %1n characters.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_FV_COMMENTS_TOO_LONG
message.locale: The value entered is too long (%1n) - maximum allowed is '%2n'.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_XRV_HAS_ASSOCIATED_SERVICE_OFFERING_CANNOT_DELETE
message.locale: This criterion, %1s, is associated with the service offering, %2s, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_XRV_HAS_ACTIVE_RESPONSE_SCORES_CANNOT_MODIFY_RESPONSE_TYPE
message.locale: The Criterion has active response scores for the Response Type,'%1c',the Response Type cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEEVALUATIONCRITERION_XRV_HAS_ACTIVE_SERVICE_EVALUATIONS_CANNOT_MODIFY
message.locale: The criterion %1s, is used in service evaluation(s), it cannot be modified.
